docs.text: betconnect Simple python wrapper for the BetConnect api, allowing for retriveal of data for active betting markets and betting operations associated with those markets, see examples
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Help Please try the following channels for any support: BetConnect API Slack Group for any help in using the library
